question: Wie viele Fachwerkhäuser hat die Altstadt von Bamberg, Deutschland?
asked_question_translated: How many half-timbered houses are there in the old town centre of Bamberg, Germany?
answer: The old town centre of Bamberg, Germany, has over 2,400 historic buildings, many of which are half-timbered houses.
answer_translated_eng: The old town centre of Bamberg, Germany, has over 2,400 historic buildings, many of which are half-timbered houses.
